Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.turn

Class TurnState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.turn.TurnState
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Build, ChoosePlayerPower, Move, SelectPowers, SelectStartingPlayer, WorkerPlacing
public abstract class TurnState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
Used to connect the different state with the game

    • shouldShowInteraction

      public abstract boolean shouldShowInteraction​(Game game, Player player)
      Checks if the custom interaction button should be shown in the current state of the turn
      Parameters:
      game - current game
      player - current player
      Returns:
      true if the player can activate/deactivate powers

    • toggleInteraction

      public void toggleInteraction​(Game game, Player player)
      Called every time the player clicks on a special button that's customized based on the behaviour of the player current power.

      For example, if a player has the possibility to build another time in the turn, the button allows him to end the turn instead.

      Every power is handled differently but uses the same button

      Parameters:
      game - current game
      player - current player

    • getBlockedMoves

      public java.util.Map<Power,​java.util.List<Point>> getBlockedMoves​(Game game, Player player, Worker worker)
      Checks what squares near the selected worker are unavailable for the current action
      Parameters:
      game - current game
      player - current player
      worker - selected worker
      Returns:
      the list of unavailable squares

    • getValidMoves

      public java.util.List<Point> getValidMoves​(Game game, Player player, Worker worker)
      Checks what squares near the selected worker are available for the current action
      Parameters:
      game - current game
      player - current player
      worker - selectedWorker
      Returns:
      the list of available squares

    • undo

    • isPositionBlocked

      public boolean isPositionBlocked​(Game game, java.util.Map<Power,​java.util.List<Point>> map, Point point)
      Utility check for blocked positions
      Parameters:
      game - current game
      map - with blocked moves and by which power
      point - to be checked
      Returns:
      true if given position is blocked by some power
